snippet: Everton manager Roberto Martinez said on Friday they had made "an approach" to sign full back Sam Byram from Leeds United, amid media reports that a 4 million pounds offer had been accepted by the second tier club....
lead_paragraph: Everton manager Roberto Martinez said on Friday they had made "an approach" to sign full back Sam Byram from Leeds United, amid media reports that a 4 million pounds offer had been accepted by the second tier club.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur will be among the teams fighting for the Premier League title this season despite their recent problems, midfielder Dele Alli said....

snippet: Wales manager Chris Coleman has distanced himself from a return to the Premier League, indicating that he might prefer to work in Europe when his time in charge of the Euro 2016 semi-finalists ends....

headline.main: Wales Manager Coleman Eyes Job in Europe
headline.print_headline: Wales Manager Coleman Eyes Job in Europe

lead_paragraph: Wales manager Chris Coleman has distanced himself from a return to the Premier League, indicating that he might prefer to work in Europe when his time in charge of the Euro 2016 semi-finalists ends.

snippet: Aston Villa have handed much-travelled manager Steve Bruce the task of leading the former European champions back into the Premier League....

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have handed much-travelled manager Steve Bruce the task of leading the former European champions back into the Premier League.

snippet: Swansea City are selling striker Eder to French side Lille for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on their website (www.swanseacity.net) on Tuesday....

headline.main: Swansea Make Eder's Lille Loan Move Permanent
headline.print_headline: Swansea Make Eder's Lille Loan Move Permanent

lead_paragraph: Swansea City are selling striker Eder to French side Lille for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on their website (www.swanseacity.net) on Tuesday.
